subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar announced it had granted Busch a waiver that would allow him to qualify for the Chase for the Sprint Cup championship even though he missed the first 11 races.
snippet: Nascar announced it had granted Busch a waiver that would allow him to qualify for the Chase for the Sprint Cup championship even though he missed the first 11 races.
